creator: dick.williams@zeborg.com
text:
I am using the <move> task to rename a directory that contains my source code, 
which I have checked out from CVS. After the move is done,  using this task:

<move  todir="${build.number}">
	<fileset dir="current"/>
</move>

1) the original directory structure is left behind (should be gone - I 
said "move")
2) the CVS directories in the source tree and their content do not appear in 
the new tree.
